mapper.insert: insert into tb_u3d_web_exp_result(experiment_id, experiment_type_id, experiment_method_id, user_id, total_pick_time, order_number, work_time, create_time, update_time, goods_item, max_goods_num) values (#{experimentId},#{experimentTypeId},#{experimentMethodId},#{userId},#{totalPickTime},#{orderNumber}, #{workTime},now(),now(),#{goodsItem},#{maxGoodsNum})
